comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
I can't refresh attributes while creating a new bug from the error log.
- I use create bug in Error log
- I notice that Mylyn versions are not updated and press 'Refresh attributes'
- I get an error and can no longer submit from mylin with attached stack trace

Reported using web interface!

Rob, we need to define the invariants (i.e. which fields can be null) for AbstractRepositoryTaskEditorInput and enforce them using assertions. It is hard to track down the cause of these errors otherwise since the exceptions show up at some later point when unrelated operations are executed.
Rob: this looks there's a null input, but could you take a quick look at this since the fix could make it into this evening's build?
Rob, please verify if this could have a similar cause as bug 205524 .
There are two more reports that have a smiliar stack trace: bug 206578 and bug 206579.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 205524 ***
Sorry for slow response on this Steffen. I agree with your points in comment#2 and believe these are all resolved by your patch on 205524.
